name: jon-bassi.GitHub.io
body:
# Jonathan Bassi #
I'm a current student at Cal Poly, studying computer science. I have an avid interest in data mining and analytics and am hoping to land an internship for the summer doing just that.  I am also working on my senior project at the moment which also involves data mining and analytics.  Some other areas of interest to me are algorithm creation/implementation and analysis, software engineering, and game design.  If you have any questions, comments, or would like to know more please message my Github account at [jon-bassi](https://github.com/jon-bassi) or on [LinkedIn](www.linkedin.com/in/jonbassi).  Thank you!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
